duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform land title research, tax card research, and onsite and online title research and reporting.
Generate Chain of Title and Limited Title Certificates, and prepare Vesting and Marketable Title files.
Examine documentation to verify properties' legal descriptions, ownership, or restrictions and prepare reports on title encumbrances.
Pull tax cards, locate tax cards online, and conduct onsite and/or online research for Vesting and Marketable Title file production.
Assemble and post title files according to Project Procedures.
Work effectively and professionally with office staff, the client, and courthouse employees to ensure a healthy work environment and staff satisfaction.

education_certification.credential: Some college in a related field; or one or more years of experience in an applicable area (i.e. real estate, title abstracting, etc.)
